channel.title: Need help with brackets :p

item.title: Need help with brackets :p
item.dc:creator: @purestmage74 purestmage74
item.description:
@purestmage74 wrote:

guthix1pker:

if you read the original command properly, he wanted it to be in wild I think…as a admin command?

Nah see this:

if (playerCommand.equals("special")) { 
                               if (!c.inWild())
                                 c.specAmount = 10.0;
                        }
           }

The

if (!c.inWild())

means no if in the wilderness due to the ! before if (inwild())

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with brackets :p
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

[quote=“guthix1pker, post:10, topic:421347”]if (playerCommand.equals("special")) { if (!c.inWild()) c.specAmount = 10.0; } }

this is what he means[/quote]
You missed a bracket sir, and this is better.

if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("spec")) {
        if (c.inWild()) {
                c.sendMessage("You cannot use this command while in the wilderness.");
                return;
        } else {
                 c.specAmount = 10.0;
                 c.sendMessage("Your special attack has been raised to full.");
        }
}

Me and purestmage put this together lol

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with brackets :p
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

[quote=“purestmage74, post:2, topic:421347”]Try this:

if (playerCommand.equals("special")) {
	if (c.inWild()) {
		c.sendMessage("You cannot use this command while in the wilderness.");
		return;
	} else {
                 c.specAmount = 10.0;
                 c.sendMessage("Your special attack has been raised to full.");
	}
}

sorry i couldn’t fix it while i was on. [/quote]
LOL He pm’d me, gave him almost the same code… but urs is better :(… I personally would use equalsingorecase.

if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("spec")) {
        if (c.inWild()) {
                c.sendMessage("You cannot use this command while in the wilderness.");
                return;
        } else {
                 c.specAmount = 10.0;
                 c.sendMessage("Your special attack has been raised to full.");
        }
}

Work as a team

src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:271: reached end of file while pa rsing } ^ 1 error Press any key to continue . . .
i know where it is can some help me this is where it is…

[code=gml]if (playerCommand.equals(“special”)) {
if (!c.inWild())
c.specAmount = 10.0;
}

[/code] THANKS GUYS~~~MOCK PRO~~~:D
